synopsis.text:
How about this?

In a thrilling crossover event, the worlds of "That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime" and "Yohane the Parhelion: Sunshine in the Mirror" collide! Rimuru and his powerful Tensura Team unexpectedly find themselves face-to-face with Yohane's determined Maboroshi Yoha Team. As the two groups clash, it seems like the Tensura Team has the upper hand. But in this unpredictable battle, who will come out on top? Catch all the action in these collaboration chibi shorts, now available on the official YouTube channels for both series!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
